captions.text:
Love is gone and I scream your name 
I’m not OK
I can never let go

Even if I listen to music in the 
club
Like it’s going to explode
I'm not OK

Even if I lie to myself saying 
I’m okay
But I can’t stop my tears

I cry out that 
I’m okay

but my heart still hurts 
trying to forget you

I don’t know was I not enough 
Baby It’s Not OK~

I can’t forget knowing 
it’s not a good memory
Baby It’s Not OK~

Love is gone and I scream 
your name, I’m not OK
I can never let go

Even if I listen to music in the 
club like it’s going to explode
I’m not OK

This Muzik makes 
You lose Control

This Muzik makes 
You lose Control

This Muzik makes 
You lose Control

This Muzik makes 
You lose Control

Lose Control lose 
Control Lo Lose Control

I act like I’m drunk and lie 
but I can’t smile anymore
I cry out that I’m okay

But there is no more 
you to lean on

I don’t know was I not enough
Baby It’s Not OK~

I can’t forget knowing 
it’s not a good memory
Baby It’s Not OK~

Love is gone and I scream 
your name, I’m not OK
I can never let go

Even I if listen to music in the club 
like it’s going to explode
I’m not OK

Oh~I’m not OK
Oh~It’s Never OK

I am running through 
this night right now

That’s how I’ll 
let the storm pass

Love is gone and I scream 
your name, I’m not OK
I can never let go

Even if I listen to music in the club 
like it’s going to explode
I’m not OK
